{"step_by_step_thinking": "Acrophobia is the fear of heights. Claustrophobia is the fear of closed or small spaces. Agoraphobia is a type of anxiety disorder in which you fear and avoid places or situations that might cause you to panic and make you feel trapped, helpless or embarrassed. It often involves fear of crowds, bridges or of being outside alone, which seems to be the closest to the fear of closed space, open space, and crowded space.", "answer_choice": "B"}
